item.title: About
item.description: BS Computer Science, Georgia Tech December 2019 Interested in full-time/new grad roles I’m particularly intruiged by work in transportation optimization, productivity, and financial openness. I derive excitement from working on products that have tangible impacts on the quality of people’s lives, enabling them to focus their time on the more important interactions. I also enjoy tackling technical problems bounded by the constraints of a system, and enabling processes to scale and function without a hitch.

item.title: Projects

Python Slack API Heroku StreetLens Traces the route of Google Maps Directions via HoloLens | HoloHack 2016 Google Maps API Google Places API C# Unity HoloLens charles HackGT 2018 Project: comparative analysis of tweets and reddit threads Python Flask Data Science osquery Fixing an int truncation error

item.title: Resume
item.description: Download PDF Education Georgia Institute of Technology Aug 2016 – Dec 2019 | Atlanta, GA B.S. in Computer Science (Intelligence and Information Internetworks), Honors Program GPA: 3.68 Affiliations: Alpha Kappa Psi (Business Fraternity), Ramblin’ Raas (Nationally Competitive Dance Team) Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning, Robotics and Perception, Algorithms, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Intro to Computer Systems and Networks, Computer Organization and Programming, Probability and Statistics, Discrete Math, Linear Algebra, Multivariable Calculus, Data Structures/Algorithms Experience Forward Deployed Software Engineering Intern | Palantir May 2019 - Aug 2019 | London, UK
